long_description: Tough and ready to tame the trails, Brooks Cascadia 8 women's trail-running shoes offer a supportive platform and aggressive traction to handle the twisty, muddy, rooty trails of ultras. Medial and lateral Pivot Posting system offers stability on uneven surfaces. Outsoles have a decoupled crash pad design to smooth out the landing zone. Lightweight, quick-drying synthetic leather and nylon/polyester mesh uppers. Geometric microfiber overlays enhance fit. Element air-mesh provides ventilation and moisture management. DNA cushioning uses high viscosity liquid to customize the cushion. BioMoGo polymer alloy foam midsoles provide energy return and reduce fatigue. Removable insoles. Ballistic Rock Shield hardened EVA plates protect forefeet. High-density carbon rubber and recycled rubber outsoles for durability. Aggressive lugs maximize grip.
short_description: Tough and ready to tame the trails, Brooks Cascadia 8 women's trail-running shoes offer a supportive platform and aggressive traction to handle the twisty, muddy, rooty trails of ultras.
